title: pixel 5 tilt sensor need some calibration (always wrong about 2 degrees to one side)
content:
i've trying to googling some options to calibrate it, but didn't found any working for my pixel 5.

it shows incorrect horizon  (about 2 degrees always to one side) from the first time i've took it from the box. mainly i've noticed it anytime in camera app. but fully the same issue in any application, which can show level.
any options to calibrate it myself?
